1.title: Nintendo Switch Wish List
1.plot: Let us all take a moment to ponder about our hopes and desires for the next generation of Nintendo before the big January 12 presentation.

2.title: Nintendo Switch Presentation 2017
2.plot: Who needs a live reaction? Scripted snark and a critique on the Nintendo Switch Presentation lies within.

3.title: History of Smash Bros. Rumors and Leaks
3.plot: Being one of the most popular franchises ever conceived, Super Smash Bros. has loads of hype behind it whenever a new game is announced. Because of this, leaks and rumors are a plenty in the world of Smash, so it's high time to take a look back at most major ones in each entry of the franchise.

4.title: Why the Wii U Failed
4.plot: Just looking at the console gives me a hearty dose of depression.

5.title: Tinder
5.plot: I'm very lonely. Happy Valentine's Day.

6.title: What the Wii U Did Right
6.plot: 14 million suckers bought it for some reason, so let's dive into what the Wii U did right.

7.title: Most Wanted Nintendo Switch Games
7.plot: Let's kill time before the Switch launches by smashing Wii Us and talking potential Switch games.

8.title: Nintendo Switch: Three Days In
8.plot: Gawk as I over judge this bitter tasting cartridge player.

9.title: Console Wars
9.plot: Let's take a look back at some wars, that of the console variety of course.

10.title: Physical vs Digital Games
10.plot: Clutter scares the piss out of me.

11.title: A Look Back at the Nintendo 3DS
11.plot: Time to slide on the nostalgia goggles and take a look back at my personal experiences with the Nintendo 3DS.

12.title: Breath of the Wild Isn't Perfect
12.plot: Who needs credibility when you can complain about a Zelda game?

13.title: Microconsoles
13.plot: Mobile games on the TV. I don't know about you but I'm sold.

14.title: Star Fox Zero: Bad Game or Baddest Game?
14.plot: I don't feel like a Star Fox, I feel like a loser.

15.title: Stop Smoking!
15.plot: It's time to start smoking to stop smoking.

16.title: Mario Kart 9 Wish List
16.plot: Just in time for Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, I discuss my wishes, desires, prayers and demands for Mario Kart 9.

17.title: Definitive Editions
17.plot: Tonight we'll be taking a look at definitive editions, ports, and remasters of games and defend their existence.

18.title: GameCube Was Best
18.plot: Get this: the GameCube was the best Nintendo console.

19.title: The First E3
19.plot: Gauk as we take a look at the first E3 ever and recap/review the press conferences.

20.title: Fixing the Worst Game Trailers
20.plot: Let's take a look at four of the most disliked game trailers out there while also trying to make them somewhat better.

21.title: Nintendo Mini Consoles Wish List
21.plot: Let's talk about what games future potential Nintendo Mini Consoles could have.

22.title: Ranking the Final Smashes
22.plot: Dirty casual play reigns supreme as we take a look at all final smashes and rank them from my least favorite to favorite.

23.title: A Look Back at E3 Rumors
23.plot: As E3 2017 is starting up, let's take a look back at just a few E3 rumors from the past few shows.

24.title: E3 2017
24.plot: Let's take a critical look at each and every major press conference of E3 2017.

25.title: Super Mario 3D World: A Critical Second Look
25.plot: It's a good game but it's trash.

26.title: Fitness Games
26.plot: Time to break a sweat and start giving a sh*t, because we're taking a look at fitness games.

27.title: Most Wanted Smash Bros. Stages
27.plot: Let's take a look at a handful of stage concepts that would be killer in Smash Bros.

28.title: Who Will Be the Next SEGA?
28.plot: Which of the big three gaming companies have the most to gain by leaving the hardware business?

29.title: ARMS vs Splatoon: Battle of the New IPs
29.plot: Let's see which of Nintendo's latest new franchises comes out on top. Stay tuned for my first impressions of Splatoon 2 at the very end.

30.title: Gaming on a Budget
30.plot: Scott goes out to see how much can be bought for the price of a new game.

31.title: The Art of Speedruns
31.plot: Scott talks about speedruns and what makes them so interesting to watch.

32.title: Gravity Rush: Tales from the Backlog
32.plot: In a brand new segment, Scott takes a look at an ever growing backlog of games, starting with Gravity Rush Remastered.

33.title: Game Consoles That Refused to Die
33.plot: Scott takes a look at game consoles that led surprisingly long lives.

34.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
34.plot: Look how stupid he looks! Scott takes a look at the first Sonic the Hedgehog game released for the Sega Genesis.

35.title: The Rise and Fall and Rise of Amiibo
35.plot: Plastic sh*t makes everything that much better. Scott takes a look at the growth of amiibo, the fall of amiibo and on top of that, the recent comeback of amiibo.

36.title: The Best Games of All Time
36.plot: No more 7/10s for us as we're taking a look at every game scoring a 97 or above on Metacritic.

37.title: The Worst Games of All Time
37.plot: Scott plays the 10 worst games of all time. What a turn off.

38.title: NES and SNES Classic Alternatives
38.plot: Scott takes a look at consoles that are considered competition against the NES Classic Edition and SNES Classic Edition.

39.title: E3 1996
39.plot: Scott decides to go full on topical and talk about E3 1996.

40.title: A Console's Last Game
40.plot: Scott takes a look at the sorry sack full of games that ended a console's life.

41.title: Nintendo World Championships
41.plot: Scott has the competitive edge so obviously it's time to take a look back at Nintendo World Championships plus the other Nintendo competitions.

42.title: The Wii: Underpowered Yet Underrated
42.plot: Scott takes a look back at everybody's least favorite favorite console, the Nintendo Wii.

43.title: Polybius
43.plot: Happy Halloween. Scott takes a look at one of the most infamous urban legends in all of gaming, Polybius.

44.title: The Legend of Zelda (NES): Tales from the Backlog
44.plot: Scott takes a look at the NES classic, The Legend of Zelda, in another installment of Tales from the Backlog.

45.title: Super Mario Galaxy: Ten Years of Bliss
45.plot: Scott takes a look at his favorite game of all time on its tenth anniversary, Super Mario Galaxy.

46.title: Black Friday
46.plot: Scott gets a whiff of the holiday spirit/fear in the air so naturally talks about Black Friday.

47.title: Call of Duty on Wii
47.plot: Scott takes a look at the Wii ports of the franchise with the biggest crotch of them all, Call of Duty.

48.title: Lost in Localization
48.plot: Scott takes a look at the localization process and just what exactly it can do to your favorite games. Eek.

49.title: Super Mario Odyssey vs Breath of the Wild: Battle of the Masterpieces
49.plot: Scott pits two of the best games of 2017 against each other to see which one reigns supreme all while giving advice in the most "morbid social experiment" way you could give advice.

50.title: A Very Madden 08 Christmas
50.plot: Scott's love for Madden 08 can be lethal, especially during the holidays.

1.title: Player's Choice
1.plot: Scott takes a look at the worst of the worst in the realm of re-releases, Player's Choice, Greatest Hits and Platinum Hits.

2.title: History of Nintendo Switch (NX) Rumors and Leaks
2.plot: Scott takes a look at the history of Photoshop and overcompensation leading up to the announcement of the Nintendo Switch.

3.title: Launch Titles
3.plot: Scott takes a look at the launch line ups for various consoles and judges them hard.

4.title: The Guy Game
4.plot: Scott takes a look at America's favorite past time, The Guy Game. Happy Valentine's Day.

5.title: Most Wanted HD Remakes
5.plot: Scott wades out a snowstorm by heading to regurgitation station and talks HD remakes he wants to see.

6.title: E3 1997
6.plot: Combatting the iron grip of a wet floor sign, Scott decides to talk some E3 1997.

7.title: Nintendo Switch: One Year In
7.plot: Get ready for some clots because Scott goes over the first year of Nintendo Switch.

8.title: Death of a Franchise
8.plot: After mourning the loss of everybody's favorite Ringo, Scott takes a look back at video game series that are far from active and why we haven't seem them in so long.

9.title: Super Smash Bros. (N64): Smash Hit
9.plot: Scott takes a look at the birth of everybody's favorite pastime, Super Smash Bros. on the Nintendo 64.

10.title: The WiiWare Chronicles I
10.plot: During a reign of post apocalyptic anarchy, Scott looks back at some titles for WiiWare. Welcome to The WiiWare Chronicles.

11.title: The Bible Game
11.plot: Scott goes to Christianity and beyond by taking a look at The Bible Game. Happy Easter.

12.title: 2D to 3D
12.plot: Scott looks at the creaky transition from 2D to 3D in the video game industry.

13.title: Nintendo Before Video Games
13.plot: Scott takes a look back at everybody's favorite era of Nintendo, the sex factory one.

14.title: Get Rich Quick!
14.plot: Scott is up against his greatest foe yet: debt. Happy Tax Day.

15.title: The Games That Time Forgot
15.plot: Scott ventures into the world of lost video games after being promoted.

16.title: New Super Mario Bros. (Series): What's New is Old
16.plot: Scott decides he's had enough of the whole differentiation thing between the games he plays and looks at the New Super Mario Bros. series.

17.title: The WiiWare Chronicles II
17.plot: 2019 Scott's back to reminisce about 2018's Scott's WiiWare binge and how he believes the Wii Shop Channel will end peacefully. Poor poor naive 2018 Scott.

18.title: Nintendo Labo: Adventures with the Variety Kit
18.plot: Scott takes a look at bankruptcy with the Nintendo Labo Variety Kit.

19.title: Game Compilations Compilation
19.plot: Scott takes a look at s'mores (game compilations).

20.title: Super Mario Galaxy 2: Derivative Bliss
20.plot: Scott takes a look at his least favorite Super Mario Galaxy game.

21.title: Game Foods
21.plot: Scott finds out what Luigi tastes like.

22.title: Tech Demos
22.plot: E3 2018? You mean time for Scott to talk about Project Milo right?

23.title: E3 2018
23.plot: Scott gets his bankruptcy filin' glands ready while also taking a look at E3 2018.

24.title: When Gimmicks Go Too Far
24.plot: Scott traverses the galaxy to find things such as the Kinect's incompetency and the Wii Vitality Sensor.

25.title: Super Smash Bros. Melee: The Best One, Apparently
25.plot: Scott takes a look at a contender for the Top 10 Smash Bros. Games list.

26.title: Let's Make a Game Console!
26.plot: Scott puts his ability to oust any and all game companies to use by coming up with ideas for new Xbox, PlayStation and Nintendo systems.

27.title: To Milk a Franchise
27.plot: Scott talks about how there's more Assassin's Creed than Sushi Striker. How did we get here?

28.title: Rated E for Irrelevant
28.plot: Scott goes over his thoughts on those letters on the game boxes.

29.title: Super Smash Bros. Brawl: The Worst One, Apparently
29.plot: Scott takes a look at a contender for the Top 10 Worst Smash Bros. Games list.

30.title: A Look Back at Nintendo Direct Rumors
30.plot: Scott talks disappointing lies about future disappointments.

31.title: Devil's Third: Nintendo's Adopted Abomination
31.plot: Scott takes a look at everybody's favorite least favorite game published by Nintendo.

32.title: E3 1998
32.plot: It's August 2018. Or as Scott likes to put it: It's time to talk about E3 1998.

33.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 - Return of a Laughing Stock
33.plot: Scott takes a look back at the return of that thing that was in Sonic Lost World.

34.title: Development Hell
34.plot: Scott looks at games that never came out until they did.

35.title: Viral Games
35.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

36.title: Game Controllers
36.plot: Scott takes a look at the history of game controllers and just how exactly we got to the Wii U GamePad.

37.title: The Best Selling Games of All Time
37.plot: Scott talks some Wii Play plus the 14 other best selling games of all time.

38.title: Mega Man (NES) Growing Pains
38.plot: Scott takes on the first Mega Man game and sees what happens when Blue Bomber meets blue border.

39.title: The WiiWare Chronicles III
39.plot: 2019 Scott reminisces about 2018 Scott doing the whole "looking at more WiiWare games" things.

40.title: Nintendo DS: Touched at First Sight
40.plot: Scott looks back at the PictoChat machine that also sometimes plays Yoshi Touch and Go.

41.title: Wii Music - Ten Years of Terror
41.plot: Scott celebrates the ten year anniversary of oh god.

42.title: Night Trap
42.plot: Happy Halloween. Wanna hear something really scary? Scott takes a look at Night Trap.

43.title: Cheat Codes
43.plot: Scott tries his hand at video game adultery.

44.title: Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo's 3DS/Wii U - For Here or To Go?
44.plot: Scott takes a look at a 2 for 1 combo deal of a Smash Bros. game.

45.title: Game Stores
45.plot: Scott gets asked, "What brings you in today?"

46.title: As Seen on TV
46.plot: Happy Thanksgiving. Scott decides to only buy As Seen on TV products before finally deciding he just wants to be seen on TV himself.

47.title: Console Redesigns
47.plot: Scott looks back at consoles that were initially self conscious about their appearance.

48.title: The WiiWare Chronicles IV
48.plot: As the Wii Shop Channel's closure comes closer and closer, Scott takes a look at his dwindling supply of WiiWare games. I mean why not it's not like he has a terminal illness or something.

49.title: Collector's Editions
49.plot: Scott gets in the Christmas spirit by spending $200 more on a game for a figurine and some stickers.

50.title: It's Awesome Baby!
50.plot: After 99 times, Scott decides to look at something that isn't a stupid Nintendo game or Madden 08.

imdb.title: Scott The Woz
plot: _Scott The Woz_ (qv) is an comedic video game centric variety show that focuses on reviews, editorials, retrospectives, and much, much more.
